title: Pictograms
content:
Please post examples of pictograms for:   
   
No mobile phones   
No skateboarding   
Please do not feed the seaguls   
   
Fire exit   
Disabled   
   
Thank you

 [‹ Finding a Type Gauge](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180948/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10270 "Go to previous forum topic") [HTF Didot vs. Linotype Didot ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180948/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10167 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content:
The other day I bought this tshirt from a garage sale:   
   
 ![nophoneskate](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180948im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/69417.jpg)   
   
What the hell does it mean? Quite obvious, really:   
"Do not look for phone numbers on skateboards."   
   
hhp
Do not do skateboards with skirt.

that's upsidedown do not blind emoticons   
Tim

can't offer any seaguls or fire exits   
there was just a fish around ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180948im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180948im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/69570.gif)
